title: Core Evolution (Part 2)
body:
Core Evolution (Part 2)

Upon being teleported away by the formation of the essence corridor, Evan found himself standing in a small room. The small room was empty and there was nothing inside it.

"Is this the Core Evolution room the spirit of the tower told me about?" Evan muttered in a doubtful voice after seeing the empty room as he could not feel any kind of energy within the room that could help him evolve his core.

As Evan was looking around the room with a confused expression on his face, the floor of the room suddenly lit up.

Evan raised an eyebrow when he saw the floor of the room was shining, and a strange energy was flooding beneath the ground.

"Don't tell me there is another Eldritch Creature hiding below the floor of this room?" Evan muttered with an ugly look on his face as he felt a surge of energy coming from beneath the floor of the room. The world essence within his body began to move and he was ready to attack any time.
